description.p: Tweak-FLX1s is a comprehensive utility and tweaking tool designed for FuriOS and Linux Phones (specifically FuriPhoneFLX1 and FLX1s). It provides a modern GTK4/Libadwaita interface to manage system settings, services, and enhancements.

ul.li: System: Manage core system components, packages, and security settings like Squeekboard layouts, Wofi config, and password management.
Tweaks: Customize look and feel, including GTK3 scaling, alarm volume fixes, and Andromeda integration.
Actions: Configure hardware buttons and touch gestures using lisgd.
